column2: it doesn't hurt either that it's in the Lincoln Park area
column4: there's also outdoor seating during the summer.  But because this place is huge
column5: they went and tried to put as many tables as they could
column6: it's very tight between tables.  Food is delicious
column7: but somewhat expensive for such tiny portions.  Parking sucks
column8: so I suggest not wasting anymore than one go around the block before you valet.
